dashboard.label: M365 Security Posture : CIS IG1 Benchmark

search.query: index="ssphp_metrics_summary" ssphp.use_case.id="m365_000" earliest=-2d@d latest=now [| search index="ssphp_metrics_summary" ssphp.use_case.id="m365_000" earliest=-2d@d latest=now | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN | return SSPHP_RUN] | table ssphp.score.score, ssphp.score.color

`ssphp_metrics_index` ssphp.use_case.id="*_*_000" NOT ssphp.use_case.id="*_*.*_000" earliest=-2d@d latest=now [| search `ssphp_metrics_index` ssphp.use_case.id="*_*_000" NOT ssphp.use_case.id="*_*.*_000" earliest=-2d@d latest=now | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp.use_case.id | eval search_text="(\"ssphp.use_case.id\"=\"".'ssphp.use_case.id'."\" AND SSPHP_RUN=\"".SSPHP_RUN."\")" | stats values(search_text) as search_text | eval search_text="(".mvjoin(search_text," OR ").")" | return $search_text]
| regex ssphp.use_case.id="^m365|dns|azure|aad_[0-9]+_000$"
| rex field=ssphp.use_case.id "(?<fs>[^_]*)_(?<uc>[^_\.]*)_000" | eval fs=upper('fs'), uc="0".uc, uc=substr(uc,len(uc)-2,2), use_case_group_id=fs."-".uc, score='ssphp.score.score'."|".'ssphp.score.color'
| search fs="$tkn_selected_system$" | lookup ssphp_write_use_case_group_description_lookup.csv use_case_group_id | sort 0 use_case_group_description | table use_case_group_description, score
| eval {use_case_group_description}=score | stats values(*) as * | fields - score, use_case_group_description

index="ssphp_metrics_summary" ssphp.use_case.id="$tkn_selected_system$*" $tkn_show_ig1$ | dedup ssphp.use_case.id | search ssphp.use_case.title!="" AND ssphp.use_case.id!="*_000" ```AND ssphp.use_case.id!="*rollup*" AND ssphp.use_case.id!="m365_001" AND ssphp.use_case.id!="m365_002" AND ssphp.use_case.id!="*6_1" AND ssphp.use_case.id!="*6_2"```
| eval Score='ssphp.score.score'."|".'ssphp.score.color', Description=mvappend('ssphp.use_case.description','ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.title'), ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.v8=split('ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.v8'," ")
| rename ssphp.use_case.title as "Title", ssphp.use_case.short_description as "Name"
| search Score=*
| table "Title", Score, "Name", "Description", ssphp.use_case.id, ssphp.use_case.description, ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.title, ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.v8 | rename ssphp.use_case.description as "Use Case Description", ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.v8 as "Controls", ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.title as "Control Title", ssphp.use_case.id as "Use Case ID"
| sort 0 Title
